segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman drying a plate, looking so focused and content.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is running, but she's not noticing the water starting to overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, look at those kids over there by the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on a stool that's wobbling a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, her arm up like she's waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet how they're sneaking cookies together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks unsteady; he might fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pooling on the floor now, right by the woman's foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't even glanced down; she's too absorbed in that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR
